name: @dfatwork-pkgs/oras-client
description: Node.js bindings for OCI Registry As Storage (ORAS) - Rust oci-client library

scripts.move-native: mkdir -p src/generated dist && mv -f index.js index.d.ts src/generated/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f *.node src/generated/ 2>/dev/null || true && mv -f *.node dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy-generated: mkdir -p dist/generated && cp -f src/generated/*.js src/generated/*.d.ts dist/generated/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f dist/*.node dist/generated/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run build:native && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:native:debug && npm run build:ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && napi prepublish -t npm
